items.title: Download
items.description: NocoDB offers users the ability to export data from the spreadsheet grid in a variety of formats. This feature is useful when working with large datasets and can be used in conjunction with the Filter and Sort feature to further refine your data.

items.title: Import data into an existing table
items.description: Learn how to import data into an existing table in NocoDB.

items.title: JSON
items.description: JSON is a custom field type that allows you to store JSON data in a field. Useful for storing data that can be represented as a JSON object, like API Response, or a set of key-value pairs.
